alreadyTranslator: Я бачу, Ви вже перекладач. Ось, що Ви можливо шукаєте:
projectLink: Ви можете знайти посилання на проєкт [тут](%%link%%).
question: Маєте запитання?
askTranslators: Не соромтесь запитувати про проєкт в %%botTranslators%%. Не забудьте надіслати посилання на рядок, про який Ви запитуєтесь!
checkGuide: Check out our guide with a bunch of useful Crowdin tools and tips to get started! You can find it on %%gettingStarted%%.
newTranslator: Are you looking to translate our bot to your own language?
join: We'd love to have you on the project! Here's how you can join us:
openProject: First, please open the project on Crowdin
howOpen: This can be done by accessing the link found [here](%%link%%).
clickLanguage: Now, click on the language you want to translate
requestJoin: In order to join that language, you must hit "Join" and write a simple message on why you want to join the project.
requestInfo:
When submitting your request, please make sure to include either your tag (%%tag%%) or your ID (%%id%%).
**If you do not include at least one of these, you will be rejected!**
langRequest: It is possible that we don't support your language yet. If that's the case, please contact an administrator asking them to add the language you want.
